TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An action that is not made by choice. In the body, involuntary actions (such as blushing) occur automatically, and cannot be controlled by choice.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Acto que no se realiza por voluntad propia. En el cuerpo, las acciones involuntarias (como el rubor) se presentan en forma automática y su control no depende de una decisión de la persona.
